name: tiny-entity2
description: A simple and easy to use ORM framework, support NEDB, IndexedDB, MySQL and Sqlite and other commonly used database

scripts.test: npm run test:nedb&&npm run test:mysql&&npm run test:indexedDB
scripts.test:nedb: cross-env currentDataBaseType=nedb  istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- -R spec
scripts.test:mysql: cross-env currentDataBaseType=mysql istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- -R spec

author: likecheng
